channel.title: CVE Feed for Seraphinite Solutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Seraphinite Solutions -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-49740|2023-12-14T14:40:36.861Z -- seraphinite%20solutions -- seraphinite%20accelerator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Seraphinite Solutions Seraphinite Accelerator allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Seraphinite Accelerator: from n/a through 2.20.28.

item.title: CVE-2023-48279|2023-11-30T13:14:04.226Z -- seraphinite%20solutions -- seraphinite%20post%20.docx%20source
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Seraphinite Solutions Seraphinite Post .DOCX Source allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects Seraphinite Post .DOCX Source: from n/a through 2.16.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-22138|2024-03-28T06:29:12.078Z -- seraphinite%20solutions -- seraphinite%20accelerator
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Seraphinite Solutions Seraphinite Accelerator.This issue affects Seraphinite Accelerator: from n/a through 2.20.47.
